tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Molar Extraction,
review: Biswajit sir has done a very satisfactory treatment. I have a phobia about tooth extraction but he did a wonderful work. Now, my RCT is going on, and I hope I will recover very soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Good professional friendly well trained hygiene environment Doctors and staffs are well trained helpful good behaviour

I am Shaswati Basu. I'm pursuing a course in Computer Science Engineering. I met with a severe accident on the 2nd of May. I fell down from my college bus on a busy street and broke one of my incisors. I came to Doctor Panda a week later. Sir checked the condition of my tooth and asked me to get a root canal treatment done to two of my teeth. The RCT really helped to reduce the pain and prevent extraction. He also did a temporary filling to make the tooth look decent. 
The arrangement of my teeth was not exactly perfect which made my smile look a little distorted since childhood. Sir helped me fix that too by a method popularly known as 'smile correction'. This process basically includes crown cutting followed by a temporary teeth attachment. The permanent teeth (all ceramic crown in my case) is attached a few days later.
The translucent crown looks way better than my original teeth and can be hardly distinguished from real. My smile looks so much prettier than before, something way beyond my imagination. I smile in all my pictures these days unlike before. 
Dr. B.Panda and Dr. K.Chatterjee has both made this possible which has sort of given me a new look altogether. They are simply amazing professionals and I feel really lucky to have got my treatment done by them. I would forever be grateful to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,
review: We were treated by Dr. Panda and his team for RCT, wisdom tooth extraction, scaling, polishing, and filling for my parents. Everything including the RCT and tooth extraction went smooth and painless. Everyone in the team is very kind, they took time to explain elaborately what the problems are, and how they will be fixed. They use advanced tools and techniques to perform the treatment which is one of the reasons for the pain-free experience. The anesthesia applied before treatment and the post-treatment pain control and anti-infection medicines prescribed by them were very good, which also prevented any kind of pain. We followed all the post-treatment tooth care instructions exactly as provided by them. Definitely recommend Whitezone Clinic for any kind of dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Biswajit Panda is one sincere, dedicated, fully confident about his  profession doctor. His regarded at the same time friendly behavior with the seniors is quite remarkable to record for appreciation. 
His supporting doctors, and trainee doctors were quite excellent under his valued leadership. Ambience of the White Zone chamber was remarkable and the healthcare  directives as per MOEF was totally maintained. 
Finally the front line manager and the others behavior was quite befitting for any new patient .
Regards
DNChakravarti
BE(Mech)FIE,GDMM,Fw.MM,LM-ASCI
Fellow and Distinguished member.. IIMM
reply_text:
We are Honoured üëè
Appreciating our staff means a lot 
Wish to serve you best results for treatment also

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After examining my teeth the doctors Dr. Panda and Dr. Sreyashi Bandopadhay explained clearly about the problems.  1. There were a lot of food particles in between my teeth for which I needed scaling/polishing 2. There was severe pain near my left bottom wisdom tooth which required extraction.
I opted for both the treatments.  *** ******* **** **** ***** ***  the entire setup of the clinic was very clean.  I specifically liked the following 
- explanation of problem
- doctors were very polite, sympathetic *** ********** ********* ********* the efficiency with which my tooth extraction process was handled. It was done by Dr. Bandopadhay and Dr. Panda was frequently supervising it and asking me not to take any tension
- the post extraction advice. 

Thank you Dr. Panda, Dr.  Bandopadhay and the entire staff of the clinic.

These feedback helps us to serve you even more better

review:
The Doctor was Friendly and polite.
I had cavity in front teeth 
I came all the way from Bordhoman to visit whitezone.
I am very much pleased seeing the clinic and modern instruments.
Teeth coloured esthetic fillings were done for me by Dr.panda and team and I am very happy with the whole process.my smile is back on my face. 
I recommend Dr panda to everybody.
Sir has recommended me for smile designing and I am looking forward to it.
I am also happy learning brushing technique and other oral hygiene procedures.
Staff is very polite and friendly..

Hello everyone myself Subhashree.I have visited White Zone in the month of August last year. My treatment went really well for several months and i didn't faced any problems or challenges. At the beginning I was very scared as I have incurred whole lotta problems but one thing I had was immense trust and faith over Dr.Biswajit Panda and Dr. Krishnakali Chatterjee.
Both the doctors and other staffs over here are very trustworthy and well behaved. Ambience here is also good.

I am very happy as I am able to smile now freely and have gained back my confidence.In fact I have recommended White Zone to my friends/family .

Thanks a lot White Zone.

I came with pain in left upper back region with reference from my wife.
Doctors of white zone are very generous and knowledgeable.
Seeing the digital x ray doctors suggested me to do a re filling of the old silver filling done in childhood.
I am hoping for the best.
Staff is polite
Homely atmosphere
I recommend white zone for proper diagnosis ,treatment plan and execution by doctors.
I feel special when I get appointment confirmation msg and birthday wishes by practo.
Best wishes
Strongly recommend for painless procedure.

My smile designing experience was quite good. It had taken a total period of 2 months which includes one follow-up session. I am highly satisfied with my doctors, the ambience at the clinic and the behaviour of the paramedics. They were definitely friendly and explained the solution to my problem in the most simple and non-technical language. I would recommend other people who are suffering from poor level of self-esteem owing to low quality of dental features to come over to white zone and have at least one consultation to consider your chances of improvement. Thank you  !!

They give me a package and number of sittings required which I found very effective and smooth for patients coming from far.

I consulted Dr panda with pain in right upper premolar 6months back and left with medicines. I showed many drs in bagnan but everybody suggested me for rct but Dr panda confirmed the diagnosis that it was a fracture due to biting smthing hard and infected.
I came again to white zone to get the extraction done.
As expected it was absuletely painless.
He used spray and special needles for injection and extraction was also pain free. Laser sterilization of the area too.
Healing touch of Dr  team and staff makes everything smooth. I strongly recommend white zone . God bless

I m basically from Mumbai nw in Kolkata fr my business. Visited n number f dentist n Mumbai but no body has ever explained me as what all treatment I need n wt wl be the best one fr me. Dr panda ws the first person to give me a clear picture f everything. 
I hd a missing lower anterior tooth for which SME one he attempted implants n Mumbai BT it failed within few days. After observing my opg Dr panda recommended me fr all ceramic bridges. 
Wonderful execution with awesome finish. I m really satisfied by his work, behavior, management.

I was busy after retirement and neglected my teeth.
With an emergency I visited White zone.
Dr.panda suggested me root canal 
Pain vanished by next day .
I underwent replacement of missing teeth in right side with warranted cad\cam crowns from dentcare dental lab as suggested by in house team of doctors.
Now my chewing efficiency has increased.
Geeta,  assistants and Mr naidu made my treatment very smooth.
God bless Dr panda and Dr krishnakali .  
I strongly recommend white zone for painless treatment and most important comfortable homely environment.
Now I shall visit for follow up and do the left side next month.
Thank you

I visited white zone with a complain of immense pain in my upper tooth. Immediately x ray was taken and I was explained that I have a large cavity in my 2nd last tooth. I was advised for root canal treatment. Immediately the procedure was started and I got a relief from the next day. 
On my next appointment I was advised for cad/cam mls crowns from kerela for my missing teeth. I received my bridge after 4 working days. Till now I have no pain no discomfort.
Wonderful and effective treatment. I m fully satisfied.

I went with extreme pain to white zone 
Emergency appointment was given by Greta after my office hours.
Dr biswajit advised me root canal and pain vanished next morning.
I didn't even have a single pain killer.
Treatment was explained very nicely and instant x ray was taken and started on the same day.
I was very scared of injection but with spray and spcl needles I even didn't know.
Paromita was extremely caring 
Finally my crowns have come very nice from Kerala laboratory.
It was a homely environment.
I strongly believe anybody who is scared of dental treatment this is the place you HV to come !
Wish you people all the best

Doctor Panda ,gave a patient hearing, was polite  suggestive,informative and did not try to create a apprehensive environment,  thus building trust and confident relationship between doctor and patient.
Latest technology like digital x-ray machine saved a lot of time  and treatment started ,on first day itself. God Bless Doctor Panda. Wish him all success.
The approach to the 1st floor chamber staircase needs repair and coat of paint for 1st time visitors. 
Signboard not marked and clear for quick location , due to high density commercial shops.

review: I recently here with my younger sister for her root canal treatment. First time when we go she was frightened about treatment but after warm welcome she feels friendly. The treatment was really so good n feel homely with staff and main important thing that cost was reasonable.Got perfect treatment...really satisfied with service. Now my family are now moving but still whenever I need any dental treatment I'll definitely come to Dr.Biswajit Panda. This the first place where I m so satisfied and want to give more star rating for your hard work and kindness. Thanks for good service , I recommend to all my friends n relatives. review: I went in a critical condition and my entire pain was gone with the very first sitting. Doctor tried his best to do the optimal and best for you. Very considerate and polite staff too.
reply_text:

reply_text:
Dear Keshav 
Hope you remember you required a emergency cleaning appointment for yourself. 
You are a Reffered Patient and a Old Patient so we gave you a overlapping appointment for yours. 30 mins buffer for any Dr appointment is acceptable where as we try our best to maintain the time and duration of appointments but sometimes circumstances beyond control .we do apologise for your 30 mins delay 

Regarding rates let us only decide our rates. 
Value is the word. 
You get value for what you pay.
You are getting your cleaning in our clinic  2nd -3rd time I feel , where as cleaning charges are always quoted to Patient before treatment always as a Clinic policy. 
In your case it is charged 1200 inr only according to your deposits stains calculus inside your mouth inclusive of polishing.
Thanks for your valuable feedback.

reply_text:
WE ALWAYS GIVE AND GAVE YOU WRITTEN PRIOR PRINTED TREATMENT ESTIMATE ON THE DAY OF CONSULTATION ITSELF, copy of  it is with us ,It‚Äôs  in our policy.

If you ended up paying more their must be some extra fillings or work which also is never done without Patient   relatives consent their is a language barrier, u must have paid the worth Treatment charges which was required for your health. 
Your root canal and crown was completed in 3 sittings along with the third molar Extraction and you re visited Clinic for the fillings as Dr Panda has personally dealt with your case.
WE DO TREATMENT IN PHASES 
FIRST PRIORITY IS ALWAYS GIVEN TO CHIEF COMPLAINTS OR PAIN 
Still if you had any queries we would hv been v happy to help you or sort it out during treatment.


Even now also if you have any doubts or any grievances plz feel to call back or visit us 
Thanks for your valuable feedback.
